title: Archon Hebdomad
data:
The **Archon Hebdomad** is the ruling council of the Archons in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"). They are powerful unique angels, intended to play a role similar to the [demon lords](/wiki/Demon_lord "Demon lord"). At present, the members of the Hebdomad are present in the code but can't be encountered in the game.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Barachiel](#Barachiel)
- [2 Domiel](#Domiel)
- [3 Erathaol](#Erathaol)
- [4 Astaphaios](#Astaphaios)
- [5 Raziel](#Raziel)
- [6 Sealtiel](#Sealtiel)
- [7 Zaphkiel](#Zaphkiel)

html:
Archon Hebdomad

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

The Archon Hebdomad is the ruling council of the Archons in dNetHack. They are powerful unique angels, intended to play a role similar to the demon lords. At present, the members of the Hebdomad are present in the code but can't be encountered in the game.

Contents

  • 1 Barachiel
  • 2 Domiel
  • 3 Erathaol
  • 4 Astaphaios
  • 5 Raziel
  • 6 Sealtiel
  • 7 Zaphkiel

Barachiel

7 Barachiel (No tile)
Difficulty 36
Attacks Weapon 3d7 physical, Weapon 3d7 physical, Gaze attack 1d7 blinding
7 Barachiel (No tile)
Difficulty 36
Attacks

Weapon 3d7 physical, Weapon 3d7 physical, Gaze attack 1d7 blinding

Base level 71
Base experience 6056
Speed 17
Base AC −7
Base MR 77
Alignment 20 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size medium
Resistances fire, cold, sleep, shock, poison, level drain
Resistances conveyed sleep

The Barachiel:

  • can fly.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • regenerates HP quickly.
  • can see invisible creatures.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a lord to its kind.
  • is male.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • resists level drain.

Resistances fire, cold, sleep, shock, poison, level drain
Resistances conveyed sleep

The Sealtiel:

  • can fly.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • regenerates HP quickly.
  • can see invisible creatures.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a lord to its kind.
  • is male.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • resists level drain.

rawPage:
The '''Archon Hebdomad''' is the ruling council of the Archons in [[dNetHack]]. They are powerful unique angels, intended to play a role similar to the [[demon lord]]s. At present, the members of the Hebdomad are present in the code but can't be encountered in the game.
